thread.title: Alhassan Wakaso steels himself for tough Estoril clash this weekend
thread.title_full: Alhassan Wakaso steels himself for tough Estoril clash this weekend

title: Alhassan Wakaso steels himself for tough Estoril clash this weekend
text:
Sports News | 23 October 2015 11:25 CET Alhassan Wakaso steels himself for tough Estoril clash this weekend - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ghana midfielder Alhassan Wakaso 
Ghanaian midfielder Alhassan Wakaso says he is working ever hard to maintain his superb start to life in the Portuguese league. 
The 23-year-old has played every minute of Rio's solid start to season and says he is looking forward to another victory against a tough Estoril side. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
